Description of incident: A hacker or hackers were able to access Country Corner's website and obtain customer information.  Customers may have been tricked into giving their financial information through emails that appeared to be from Country Corner, a fake Country Corner website set up by hackers, or some other method of phishing.  It is also possible that customer data was taken directly from Country Corner's computer system.  Customers began reporting fraudulent charges and Country Corner's computer system was discovered to contain malware.
